name: Hyperdimension Neptunia Re;Birth3 Uzume Battle Entry / 天王星うずめバトル参加ライセンス / 天王星渦芽 參戰許可
detailed_description:
With the Uzume Battle Entry DLC, an event will occur when you access Information at Planeptune. Here, Uzume can now join your party!

*You must progress to Chapter 2.
*If this DLC event was already seen, it will not occur again.
about_the_game:
With the Uzume Battle Entry DLC, an event will occur when you access Information at Planeptune. Here, Uzume can now join your party!

*You must progress to Chapter 2.
*If this DLC event was already seen, it will not occur again.
short_description: The Uzume Battle Entry DLC brings Uzume as a playable character!

fullgame.name: Hyperdimension Neptunia Re;Birth3 V Generation / 神次次元ゲイム ネプテューヌRe;Birth3 V CENTURY / 神次次元遊戲 戰機少女 重生3 Ｖ世紀

supported_languages:
English*, Japanese*, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7(64bit)
  • Processor: Core2Duo 2.66 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10.x or OpenGL 3.3 or better graphics card with 1 GB RAM and support for v4 shaders
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 14 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: Caution: ATI Mobility Radeon HD 5xxx, 1GB VRAM 5000 series may not work properly with this game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7(64bit) or later
  • Processor: 3GHz Intel i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10.x or OpenGL 3.3 or better graphics card with 1 GB RAM and support for v4 shaders
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 14 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: Caution: ATI Mobility Radeon HD 5xxx, 1GB VRAM 5000 series may not work properly with this game.
